title: What are some easy gigs to start with on any freelancing website? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are multiple easy gigs to start on freelancing website: Data entryProduct reviewsContent writingArticle writingBlogsEverything depends on the interests and expertise. If you have a skills to use laptop and various software then it is easy to start data entry works. Although, it will take time to get first work. The strong portfolio and experiences will help you to get work.
